mapper.select: SELECT s.*, sd.*, TO_CHAR(sd.qty * sd.price, 'L999,999,999') AS total_price, (SELECT company FROM customer c WHERE c.custcode = s.custcode) AS company_name, (SELECT name FROM item i WHERE i.code = sd.code) AS item_name FROM sales s, sales_detail sd WHERE s.sales_date = sd.sales_date

SELECT sd.*, s.title, s.sales_status, c.company, i.name, TO_CHAR(sd.qty * sd.price, 'L999,999,999') AS total_price FROM sales_detail sd, sales s, customer c, item i WHERE sd.custcode = c.custcode AND sd.custcode = i.custcode AND sd.sales_date = s.sales_date
AND c.company like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND i.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND c.company like '%'

SELECT count(*) FROM sales_detail sd, sales s, customer c, item i WHERE sd.custcode = c.custcode AND sd.custcode = i.custcode AND sd.sales_date = s.sales_date
AND c.company like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND i.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND c.company like '%'
SELECT count(*) FROM sales_detail sd, sales s, customer c, item i WHERE sd.custcode = c.custcode AND sd.custcode = i.custcode AND sd.sales_date = s.sales_date AND sd.sales_status = #{sales_status}
